id.description: ID string for the materials uploaded from a third party source inside the third party source. For materialsproject.org an example ID is mp-32

source.description: Third party source name, e.g. materials project, 2dmatpedia, ICSD, etc.

origin.description: A flag that is true when material is initially imported from a third party * (as opposed to being independently designed from scratch).

url.description: The URL of the original record, e.g. https://next-gen.materialsproject.org/materials/mp-48
url.comment: ToDo: update to use URI type per https://json-schema.org/understanding-json-schema/reference/string#resource-identifiers
